title: What's the best song of Justin Bieber? - Quora

response.answer_text: It would be tough to tell any one best song of Justin Bieber because Canadian Popstar gave many megahit songs like Baby , Boyfriend , Beauty and Beat , What do you mean , Where are you now , Sorry , Love yourself , Cold Water , Let me love you and recently he did collab in Spanish song Despacito called Despacito Remix. Justin Bieber is the only Artist who has 5 song more than 1B views on YouTube and the second artist to have 3 songs more than 1B plays on Spotify. Really he is one of the most famous and successful Artist. Well according to me his best song list should be like this • Sorry Justin uploaded his carrier's biggest hit song Sorry in 22nd October 2015 on his official YouTube channel and became 6th most viewed video on YouTube with approximately 2.9 B views at current time.  • Baby A song from his carrier's first album My World called Baby. Justin did collab with Ludacris for making this song more special. This song changed Justin's carrier and became one of the best pop star in world.  • Despacito Remix Despacito by Puerto Rican singer Luis Fonsi featuring Daddy Yankee and Justin Bieber is one of the best song ever in history. the song spent 16 weeks at No1 on chart of Billboard Hot 100 tying Maria Carey's and Boyz II Men's “ One Sweet day ” for most week spent at No. 1 .  The original version of Despacito is the most viewed video on YouTube with more than 4.7 B views ( current time ) and also won 4 latin Grammy awards for Song of the Year, Record of the Year, Best Urban Fusion/Performance, and Best Short Form Music Video.

There are many songs from JB that I love but above on top it's “Let Me Love You” :-D  *Lyrics* I used to believeWe were burnin' on the edge of somethin' beautifulSomethin' beautifulSellin' a dreamSmoke and mirrors keep us waiting on a miracleOn a miracle Say, go through the darkest of daysHeaven's a heartbreak awayNever let you go, never let me downOh, it's been a hell of a rideDriving the edge of a knifeNever let you go, never let me down Don't you give up, nah-nah-nahI won't give up, nah-nah-nahLet me love youLet me love youDon't you give up, nah-nah-nahI won't give up, nah-nah-nahLet me love youLet me love youOh, baby, baby Don't fall asleepAt the wheel, we've got a million miles ahead of usMiles ahead of usAll that we needIs a rude awakening to know we're good enoughKnow we're good enough Say go through the darkest of daysHeaven's a heartbreak awayNever let you go, never let me downOh, it's been a hell of a rideDriving the edge of a knifeNever let you go, never let me down Don't you give up, nah-nah-nahI won't give up, nah-nah-nahLet me love youLet me love youDon't you give up, nah-nah-nahI won't give up, nah-nah-nahLet me love youLet me love youOh, baby, baby Don't you give up, nah-nah-nahI won't give up, nah-nah-nahLet me love youLet me love youDon't you give up, nah-nah-nahI won't give up, nah-nah-nahLet me love youLet me love youOh, baby, baby Other JB songs that I like One Less Lonely GirlOne TimeBabyCold WaterSorryLove YourselfAs Long As You Love MeBoyfriend
